trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality that represents the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Definerer den grunnleggende funksjonaliteten som representerer personlige data for en side.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this base class contain the actual implementation for managing, applying, and extracting personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra denne basisklasse inneholde faktiske implementeringen for administrasjon, bruker og Pakk ut personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class makes use of personalization state with a reference to PersonalizationState.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>klasse ringer bruke statusen for personlige data med en referanse til PersonalizationState.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: If a developer writes a custom PersonalizationState implementation, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> must also be written.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en utvikler skriver en egendefinert PersonalizationState implementering, en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>må også være skrevet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances are responsible for creating and consuming PersonalizationState instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>forekomster er ansvarlig for å opprette og bruke PersonalizationState forekomster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The object created by this constructor manages the state for Web Parts controls that are managed by the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som er opprettet av denne konstruktøren administrerer tilstanden for webdeler kontroller som administreres av den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> that manages Web Parts controls that have personalization data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> som administrerer webdeler kontroller som har personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The webPartManager parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The webPartManager parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, gjelder personlige data til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er tilknyttet tilpassing tilstand-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was a parameter in the constructor that created the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen er en parameter i konstruktøren som opprettes av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, gjelder personlige data for den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to apply personalization data to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er abstrakt definisjonen av metoden som brukes til å bruke personlige data på en webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is applied.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollere hvilke personlige data er brukt.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization information from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, trekker ut informasjon om tilpassing fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er knyttet til den gjeldende statusen for personlige data.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of a method used to extract personalization information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Dette er abstrakt definisjonen av en metode som brukes til å hente informasjon om tilpassing fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>tilknyttet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> was a parameter in the constructor that was used to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>er en parameter i konstruktøren som ble brukt til å opprette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization data from the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, pakker personlige data fra den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to extract personalization data from a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er abstrakt definisjonen av metoden som brukes til å trekke ut personlige data fra en webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control from which personalization data is extracted.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollere hvilke personlige data trekkes.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Henter godkjenning filteret for den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control before an instance of it is created.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>streng for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollerer før en forekomst av den opprettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if there is no personalized value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skal returnere `null` Hvis ingen verdi er tilpasset for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen settet implementerer ikke en standard virkemåte for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is provided so that a developer can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er angitt slik at en utvikler kan tilordne en tilfeldig strengverdi til en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll; denne egenskapen kan kontrolleres av abonnerer på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>hendelse på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll på siden for å finne ut om kontrollen kan legges til siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control from which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: IDen for webdeler kontroll som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>hentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter string for a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Authorization Filterstrengen for en webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any personalization information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om bruk av personlige data informasjon er endret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class checks this property to determine whether the personalization state needs to be written back to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>klassen kontrollerer denne egenskapen for å finne ut om statusen for personlige data må skrives tilbake til det underliggende datalageret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state instance has changed (is "dirty"); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en forekomst av personlige data tilstand er endret (er "endret"); Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, gets a value that indicates whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, henter en verdi som angir om alle statusen for personlige data ble trekkes ut av en forekomst av tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This property is an abstract definition of a property that can be called to determine whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en abstrakt definisjonen av en egenskap som kan kalles for å finne ut om alle statusen for personlige data ble trekkes ut av en forekomst av tilstand.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state was extracted by a state instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis statusen for personlige data ble trekkes ut av en forekomst av tilstanden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the current personalization state as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Merker gjeldende statusen for personlige data som har endret.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> can use this method to mark themselves as having changed (or being "dirty"), thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>kan bruke denne metoden til å merke seg selv som har endret (eller blir "endret"), noe som angir måtte reserialize og lagre statusen for personlige data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks a Web Parts control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, merker du en webdeler kontrollen som har endret.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract definition of the method used to indicate that a Web Parts control has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Dette er en abstrakt definisjonen av metoden som brukes til å angi at en webdeler kontroll er endret (er "endret").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class exposes methods (which in turn call this method) that can be used by developers to mark a Web Parts control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klassen viser metodene (som i sin tur kalle denne metoden) som kan brukes av utviklere for å merke en webdeler kontroll som "skadet", noe som angir måtte reserialize og lagre statusen for personlige data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler-kontrollen må være merket som har endret.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, merkes de tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som har endret.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance is now considered to have changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Dette er abstrakt definisjonen av metoden som brukes for å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>forekomsten som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>forekomsten nå regnes som er endret (er "endret").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class exposes a protected method (which in turn calls this method) that can be used by developers to mark the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>klassen viser et beskyttet metode (som kaller opp denne metoden) som kan brukes av utviklere for å merke den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen som "skadet", noe som angir måtte reserialize og lagre statusen for personlige data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified Web Parts control is valid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at den angitte webdeler-kontrollen er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that `webPart` is a valid Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kontrollerer at `webPart` er en gyldig webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The base class verifies that `webPart` is not `null` and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen kontrollerer at `webPart` er ikke `null` og administreres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>tilknyttet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> should validate Web Parts controls inside of any methods that work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>må validere webdeler Kontroller inne i noen metoder samarbeider med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>forekomster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that standalone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances do not have state changes accidentally written into the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Dette sikrer at frittstående <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>forekomster har ikke statusen for endres ved en feiltakelse skrevet inn personlige data for en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: webPart is not currently managed by the associated with the .
trans-unit.target: webPartfor øyeblikket ikke administreres av den knyttet til den .

trans-unit.source: webPart is
trans-unit.target: webPart er

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control currently associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er tilknyttet tilpassing tilstand forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is the object used as a parameter for the constructor that creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen er objekt som brukes som en parameter for konstruktøren som oppretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref>.
